attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The last generations of my family have paid tax for all their lifes. Yet got no job and finding it very hard to get one. I have no experince or no trade and most jobs which you dont need training for has been takin by foreign people. I wish to ask our goverment what happened about british jobs for british people and this new training that the job centre plus was suppose to be giving us. I dont think our goverment understands how alkward life is for the unemployed is at the moment and wish for them to look into this issue in more detail.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
